answers.answer: Hi!Common causes of low platelet are Vit B12 and folic acid deficiency, leukemias, lymphomas, decreased production of thrombopoietin by liver, Dengue fever, HIV, hemolytic anemias, etc. Sometimes diabetes and low thyrid states can also cause low platelets. Please discuss this with your doctor and see what other tests could be done.Hope this helps.
